name: Champion Ribbon

name: Contest Memory Ribbon
shortDesc: A commemorative Ribbon representing all of the Ribbons you collected for contests somewhere long ago.

name: Contest Memory Ribbon
shortDesc: A commemorative Ribbon representing all of the Ribbons you collected for contests somewhere long ago.
title: the Treasured Memory

name: Skillful Battler Ribbon
shortDesc: A Ribbon that can be given to a Pokémon that has achieved victory in difficult battles.

name: Expert Battler Ribbon
shortDesc: A Ribbon that can be given to a brave Pokémon that has honed its battle skills to an art.
title: the Master

name: Battle Tree Great Ribbon
shortDesc: A Ribbon awarded for winning against a Battle Legend in the Battle Tree.
title: the Tree Victor

name: Battle Tree Master Ribbon
shortDesc: A Ribbon awarded for winning against a Battle Legend in super battles in the Battle Tree.
title: the Tree Master

name: Tower Master Ribbon
shortDesc: A Ribbon awarded for winning against a champion in the Battle Tower.
title: the Tower Master

name: Artist Ribbon
shortDesc: A Ribbon awarded for being chosen as a super sketch model in the Hoenn region.
title: the Model for Paintings

name: Effort Ribbon
shortDesc: A Ribbon awarded for being an exceptionally hard worker.
title: the Once Well-Trained

name: Alert Ribbon
shortDesc: A Ribbon for recalling an invigorating event that created life energy.
title: the Once Vigilant

name: Shock Ribbon
shortDesc: A Ribbon for recalling a thrilling event that made life more exciting.
title: the Once Cowardly

name: Downcast Ribbon
shortDesc: A Ribbon for recalling feelings of sadness that added spice to life.
title: the Once Shaken

name: Careless Ribbon
shortDesc: A Ribbon for recalling a careless error that helped steer life decisions.
title: the Once Imperfect

name: Relax Ribbon
shortDesc: A Ribbon for recalling a refreshing event that added sparkle to life.
title: the Once Well-Rested

name: Snooze Ribbon
shortDesc: A Ribbon for recalling a deep slumber that made life soothing.
title: the Once Sleepy

name: Smile Ribbon
shortDesc: A Ribbon for recalling that smiles enrich the quality of life.
title: the Once Cheery

name: Gorgeous Ribbon
shortDesc: An extraordinarily gorgeous and extravagant Ribbon.
title: the Gorgeous

name: Royal Ribbon
shortDesc: An incredibly regal Ribbon with an air of nobility.
title: the Royal

shortDesc: A gorgeous and regal Ribbon that is the peak of fabulous.
